00040   class SimpleCounter;
00041 
00042   class AbstractObserver {
00043   public:
00044     virtual ~AbstractObserver() { }
00045     
00046     virtual void start(SimpleCounter*) =0;
00047     virtual void finish(SimpleCounter*) =0;
00048     virtual void update(SimpleCounter*) =0;
00049   };
00050 
00051 
00053 
00066   class SimpleCounter  {
00067     typedef AbstractObserver ObsT;
00068     typedef std::vector<ObsT*> Observers;
00069   public:
00070   
00071     SimpleCounter() : count_(0) { }
00072     virtual ~SimpleCounter() { }
00073 
00074     void attach(ObsT*);
00075     void detach(ObsT*);
00076 
00078     virtual void notify(void);
00079 
00081     virtual void finish(void);
00082 
00084     virtual void start(void);
00085 
00087     uint count(void) const;
00088 
00090     virtual double elapsed(void);
00091 
00093     virtual uint remaining(void);
00094 
00096     virtual double timeRemaining(void);
00097 
00099     virtual double fractionComplete(void);
00100 
00101   protected:
00102     uint count_;
00103     Timer<WallTimer> timer_;
00104     Observers observers;
00105   };

00114   class EstimatingCounter : public SimpleCounter {
00115   public:
00116     EstimatingCounter(const uint n) : expected(n) { }
00117 
00119     void setExpected(uint);
00120 
00122     uint remaining(void);
00123 
00126     double timeRemaining(void);
00127 
00129     double fractionComplete(void);
00130 
00131   protected:
00132     uint expected;
00133   };

00135 
00137   class TriggerAlways {
00138   public:
00139     bool operator()(SimpleCounter*) { return(true); }
00140   };
00141 
00142 
00144 
00154   template<class Trigger = TriggerAlways, class Counter = SimpleCounter>
00155   class ProgressCounter : public Counter {
00156   public:
00157     ProgressCounter(const Trigger& t) : trig(t) { }
00158     ProgressCounter(const Trigger& t, const Counter& c) : Counter(c), trig(t) { }
00159 
00161     void setTrigger(const Trigger& t) { trig = t; }
00162 
00165     void update(void) {
00166       ++Counter::count_;
00167       if (trig(this))
00168         Counter::notify();
00169     }
00170 
00171   private:
00172     Trigger trig;
00173   };
00174

00188   class BasicProgress : public AbstractObserver {
00189   public:
00190     BasicProgress() : os_(std::cerr), prefix_("Progress - "), msg_("."), suffix_(" done!\n") { }
00191     BasicProgress(std::ostream& os, const std::string& prefix, const std::string& msg, const std::string& suffix) :
00192       os_(os), prefix_(prefix), msg_(msg), suffix_(suffix) { }
00193 
00194     BasicProgress(const std::string& prefix, const std::string& msg, const std::string& suffix) :
00195       os_(std::cerr), prefix_(prefix), msg_(msg), suffix_(suffix) { }
00196 
00197     virtual void start(SimpleCounter*);
00198     virtual void update(SimpleCounter*);
00199     virtual void finish(SimpleCounter*);
00200 
00201   protected:
00202     std::ostream& os_;
00203     std::string prefix_, msg_, suffix_;
00204   };
00205

00207 
00209   class PercentProgress : public BasicProgress {
00210   public:
00211     PercentProgress() : BasicProgress("Progress:\n", "complete", "") { }
00212     PercentProgress(std::ostream& os, const std::string& prefix, const std::string& msg, const std::string& suffix) :
00213       BasicProgress(os, prefix, msg, suffix) { }
00214     PercentProgress(const std::string& prefix, const std::string& msg, const std::string& suffix) :
00215       BasicProgress(std::cerr, prefix, msg, suffix) { }
00216 
00217     void update(SimpleCounter*);
00218     void finish(SimpleCounter*);
00219   };

00238       BasicProgress(std::cerr, prefix, msg, suffix) { }

00241     void finish(SimpleCounter*);
